io.elegie.luchess.web.framework

Interface ApplicationContextFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientContextFactory

    public interface ApplicationContextFactory
    Implementations should provide a factory, so that the application context be properly created by the framework. This context shall be created only once, and reused throughout the application lifetime.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApplicationContext create(java.util.Properties configuration) 

    • Method Detail

      • create

        ApplicationContext create(java.util.Properties configuration)
                          throws ApplicationException
        Parameters:
        configuration - All servlet parameters defined in the web.xml file. Clients may specify additional configuration files in the web.xml, retrieving their paths thanks to this method.
        Returns:
        An initialized context, to be used throughout the application.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When the application context cannot be created
